ratings.comment: Mari is a super fun instructor who was very understanding of the online situation and made sure to give extensive feedback to help build our English knowledge. English 100 is a pretty simple class. but you can get as much as you want out of it based on your interaction with her and she always responds quick!
Mari was awesome! She was super insightful, helpful, and funny. I liked her class and would definitely take her again.

Mari is a great instructor. Classes were a bit boring, but I blame to subject of the topic rather than Mari. That said, she really did a lot of different things to make the class more interesting and it worked. Would recommend her for anyone looking to take a writing class. P.S. She's a die hard Liverpool fan. Up the Reds! #YNWA
Mari is obviously dedicated to helping her students to nearly a fault. It is only E100, yet she puts in more effort than the professors who are teaching my core major requirements.
Incredibly understanding, maybe even a bit lenient but I also learned a lot! She gives a lot of feedback to help improve your writing.
Super easy A but I don't think I learned anything

I have a bunch of friends who took E100 at the same time and my class was way more useful, though with any instructor E100 is an easy A. It was clear that Mari put actual effort into giving me feedback toward my goals, so I feel like I improved as a writer even though the class itself was super easy (which was good bc all my others were ridic)
She's okay. Not a very inspired instructor but you'll easily get an A so that's something
Mari was a really great instructor to have. She was always ready to teach and help her students when needed. English 100 was one of the easiest A's I've ever gotten.
